title.rendered: Kade Sonnier: Net Worth 2023, Career Earnings

content.rendered:
Summary

  • About Kade Sonnier
    • Early Career 
    • Professional Career 
  • Kade Sonnier’s Net Worth in 2023
    • Career Earnings 
  • Personal Details
    • Girlfriend
    • How old is he?
    • What is his nationality?
    • FAQs About Kade Sonnier

Kade Sonnier is a professional rodeo contestant known for his exceptional skills in bareback riding. Born on September 6, 1999, in Lafayette, Louisiana, Sonnier has made a name for himself in the rodeo world at a relatively young age.

Here you can follow Kade Sonnier’s net worth, career earnings, professional career, achievements, relationship status, and more.

About Kade Sonnier

Sonnier was born to Jamie Guidry and Joey Sonnier, a National Finals Rodeo Saddle Bronc Rider. He also has a stepdad, Owen Begnaud. He grew up with two siblings, Kenley and Kiley, in a close-knit, supportive family.

Early Career 

Sonnier’s early career was not in rodeo but in baseball. He was a collegiate baseball player at Nicholls State University. However, a career-ending injury led him to pursue his dream of becoming a rodeo contestant.

Professional Career 

Kade Sonnier’s professional career in rodeo is a testament to his resilience and determination. After a career-ending injury in baseball, Sonnier transitioned to rodeo, specifically bareback riding, and quickly made a name for himself. Sonnier’s journey in bareback riding began in January 2020. 

Despite starting relatively late, at the age of 20, his rapid progression in the sport earned him a scholarship to rodeo for McNeese State. His talent and dedication were evident from the start, and he quickly rose through the ranks. In 2023, Sonnier made the decision to purchase his PRCA Card.

This marked the official start of his professional rodeo career. He quickly made an impact, ranking No. 2 in the Resistol Rookie standings and No. 6 in the PRCA World Standings halfway through the season.

By the end of the regular season, he had climbed to No. 3 in the PRCA Bareback Riding World Standings. Sonnier’s rookie year was filled with notable achievements. He won the 2023 Calgary Stampede, one of the most prestigious events in rodeo.

He also won the Springhill PRCA Rodeo, the first pro rodeo he ever won, for the second consecutive time. Additionally, he became the first cowboy since Will Lowe in 2009 to win Calgary and Cheyenne in the same season.

Sonnier’s success continued into his first National Finals Rodeo, where he entered with $160,469 in earnings for the regular season. His performance at the National Finals Rodeo further solidified his status as a rising star in the rodeo world.

Throughout his career, Sonnier has acknowledged the support and guidance of fellow cowboys, such as three-time World Champion Tim O’Connell, who have played instrumental roles in his success.

His unwavering commitment, relentless effort, and the encouragement of his family and fellow athletes have transformed his dream into a remarkable reality.

Kade Sonnier’s Net Worth in 2023

Sonnier’s net worth in 2023 is $1 million.

However, he earned $160,469 in the 2023 regular season.

Career Earnings 

Kade Sonnier’s career earnings in rodeo have been impressive, especially considering his relatively recent entry into the sport. As of the end of the regular season in 2023, Sonnier had earned $160,469.

His earnings have come from a variety of sources, including winnings from various rodeo events. Some of his biggest paydays have come from prestigious rodeos such as the Calgary Stampede, where he earned $29,900. He also won $12,520 at the Fort Worth Stock Show and Rodeo.

Sonnier’s earnings have steadily increased throughout the year. In July 2023, he collected $26,500 from Pool C at the Calgary Stampede. By September 2023, he was third in earnings for the season.

Personal Details

Girlfriend

Kade Sonnier is currently single. He is focusing on his career only.

How old is he?

As of November 2023, Kade Sonnier is 24 years old.

What is his nationality?

He is an American citizen.

FAQs About Kade Sonnier

What sport did Kade Sonnier play before becoming a rodeo contestant?

Kade Sonnier was a collegiate baseball player at Nicholls State University before a career-ending injury led him to pursue rodeo.

What is his ranking in the PRCA Bareback Riding World Standings?

As of 2023, he is ranked No. 3 in the PRCA Bareback Riding World Standings.

What is his net worth in 2023?

As of 2023, his net worth is $1 million.
